text.coc.natural_rift.activate.fail: The rift does not seem to respond
text.coc.natural_rift.activate.pass: The rift begins to shift slightly in response
text.coc.natural_rift.relation.level_up: You sense a change in the rift's energy
text.coc.natural_rift.contract.start:
Your head begins to pound perfously
- Contract Started -
text.coc.natural_rift.contract.win:
The pounding in your heads seems to subside.
- Contract Completed -
text.coc.natural_rift.contract.loss:
You feel the world tremble beneath you.
- Contract Failed -
text.coc.natural_rift.contract.half_time:
The pounding increases slightly.
- Half of your time remains -
text.coc.natural_rift.contract.quarter_t:
The pounding increases dramatically.
- A fourth of your time remains -
text.coc.natural_rift.contract.minute_le:
The pounding becomes excruciating.
- One minute of your time remains -

recipes.coc.ritual.binding.title: Ritual of Binding
recipes.coc.ritual.binding.subtext: Add another player to your pact, use your own blood and theirs

§fPassive: §7Shows beams of transfer
§fSneaking: §7Shows bubbles of transfer radius

recipes.coc.workbench.syringe.title: Syringe
recipes.coc.workbench.syringe.subtext: §fRight Click: §7Fill a bottle in your inventory with blood
recipes.coc.workbench.amalgam_forge.subt: §fRight click§7 ingredients on to the forge, or input them §fvia hoppers§7 on the left and right
recipes.coc.workbench.entropic_accelerat:
Converts §ftuff§7, §fgranite§7 and §fblackstone§7 into their respective ore chunks. The number of chunks is based on the amount of energy stored.
§fRight Click:§7 Activate
